song.title: After Hell
song.info:
written for the tv theme compo at scenemusic.net
this is the version with non-distorted vocals
lyrics (more or less)
we've got the power we've got ambition we've got the wisdom we've got the mission
we've got the demolition we've got the ammunition we've got the exposition we've got the superstition
we're on the highway to win we're on the highway to win
we've got the intuition we've got no competition we've got no intermission we've got are composition
we're on a run to win
